name: Zombie Gunner (itch)
description:
This game has been made with the help of the  Complete C# Unity Game Developer 3D Course. However, I tried to built upon it, by adding sound, proper UI and a nice-looking level. I hope you'll enjoy it!

How to play:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Shooting: Left-click
  • Zooming: Right-click
  • Switching Weapons (once picked up): Scroll Wheel
  • Toggle between hold to zoom and click to zoom: Tab
  • Pause: Escape

Tips:

  • If you run out of ammunition, look for man-made structures like cars and buildings!
  • Zombies don't differentiate between toe-shots and head-shoots!
  • When hit by a zombie, your remaining health is indicated by the amount of red the flash has!

Feedback:

I'd love to get some feedback about this game, especially since it is one of my first games!
